description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，第十三届全国人民代表大会吉林地区代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, and a delegate from the Jilin region to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份，王艳凤的籍贯地所在省及所代表的地区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, where Wang Yanfeng's ancestral home is located and the region she represents.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省长春市代管的县级市，王艳凤的籍贯地。
description.en: A county-level city in Jilin Province, People's Republic of China, and Wang Yanfeng's ancestral home.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会代表

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会代表
en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的组成人员。
description.en: Members of the National People's Congress, the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本信息，王艳凤是吉林榆树人，此为她的籍贯地。
description.en: According to the text, Wang Yanfeng is from Yushu, Jilin, which is her ancestral home.

description.zh-cn: 文本中的个人信息框和分类明确指出王艳凤是中国共产党党员。
description.en: The infobox and categories in the text explicitly state that Wang Yanfeng is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 于2018年2月24日当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: Elected as a delegate to the 13th National People's Congress on February 24, 2018.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会代表

position.en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 根据个人信息框中的“title”字段，王艳凤的职务是全国人大代表。
description.en: According to the 'title' field in the infobox, Wang Yanfeng holds the position of Deputy to the National People's Congress.
